DOC.HEADLINE: PRINCESS DI HELPS SAVE DROWNING MAN
DOC.TEXT: Princess Diana is being hailed as a hero for aiding a drowning man . The princess was_on her way home from a jog in London ' s Regents Park on Sunday when tourists flagged her car and said someone had fallen_into a nearby lake . Diana reportedly told her chauffeur to call police , then dashed to the bank of the lake . She was joined by Kari Kotila , 29 , a Finnish student living_in London , who swam to the 42-year-old Irish vagrant , by then unconscious , and towed him to the bank .
